pullrequest.title: Move data logger to the toolbar

content.raw:
That had been done on purpose to prevent the user from opening several loggers or closing a logger while it is recording, but I realize it didn't accomplish the second task because the user could still click the dialog's close button while recording. As of 3948b30:

* The logger stays on top of the main window even if it loses focus

* Unchecking the button closes the dialog

* Closing the dialog while it is recording stops recording
